wikipedia_page.main:
Lewis McLear (born 26 May 1996) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Caledonian Braves. 
He has previously played for St Mirren, Elgin City, Edinburgh City, Albion Rovers, Stirling Albion, and Annan Athletic.

response: On 31 March Lewis McLear signed a three–year contract extension. The deal means that he will be contracted to the club until the summer of 2018.
Also on this day, youngster Lewis McLear joined Scottish League Two side Stirling Albion on loan until the end of the season.
|29 January 2016 ||  Lewis McLear ||  Stirling Albion || Loan ||
29 June – youngster Lewis McLear left the club by mutual agreement. The midfielder had been at the club for three years, but failed to breakthrough to the first team.
